title: Feature request: Cyrillic Typography & Type Design
content:
In the 'Special Interest Groups' we have now:  
      -  Arabic Typography & Type Design  
      -  Hebrew Typography & Type Design

I suggest to create a similar group:  
      -  Cyrillic Typography & Type Design

![Cyrillic Typography & Type Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202725im_/http:/indians.ru/design/p0043-font-cinzel-cyrillic-glyphs.png)

Because the Cyrillic type design is an area that is interesting enough for everybody here with its rich history and its boom in nowadays. And the Russian type designers need a suitable place to join their efforts.

Also a non-Cyrillic authors can post here their requests to add a Cyrillic glyphs to their typefaces.

What do you think?
author: Indian
